mama nan kiyanne meka maha karuma ledak , puduma malawadayakne appa thiyenne , ekko asdeka araganda ba as deketh ekka oluwa ridenawa , ehemath naththan eka ahak ekka oluwe ee paththa ridenawa , ekko kana piti passe ridenawa , naththan ismuduna ridenawa inda ba , ekko nalala palenda enawa , ekko bella patan ganna hariyen oluwa ridenawa , samaharak welawata oluwa kelin thiyagana inda ba puduma baragathiyak danenne , ehemath naththan ekaparatama oluwa dige karant ekak duhanawa wage ehema wenakotanan indama ba ekathana galtik wenawa , ekko kandeka ahenne na agul watila.

ehi sandahan wanne templarwarun mithyadrushtikayan lesa 1308 wasare di nam kala bawath 1312 wasara wanawita sanwidhanaya sampurna lesama wisiruwa harinu labana bawath ya. 1308 agosthu 20 dathama yuth thawath chinan pathaka kiyawenne templarwarun thama kala misaditu kam piligath bawath ese piligath pirisakata nawatha palliya samaga ek wi katayuthu kirimata ida dena bawata pilip raju wisin niyoga kala bawath ya.

indiyawe nawa agamathi narendra modi mahathage diwurum dime ulelata sahabhangi wana janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha athulu shri lanka niyojitha kandayama sahabhagi wethi.indiyawe nawa agamathiwaraya wisin janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha wetha kala aaradhanawa piliganimin indiyawa bala yana shri lanka niyojitha kandayamata widesha katayuthu amathi mahacharya ji.el piris, pashu sampath ha gramiya sanwardhana amathi aarumugam thondaman, widesha katayuthu amathyanshaye adhikshana manthri sajin was gunawardhana, janadhipathi lekam lalith wirathunga mahathwarun saha widesha katayuthu amathyanshaye lekam kshanika senewirathna mahathmiya da ayath wethi.indiyawe radi sitina kalaya thula janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha nawadilliye pihiti rashtrapathi bhawan hidi erata nawa agamathi narendra modi mahatha samanga wishesha sakachchawaka niratha wimata niyamitha athara eeta amatharawa shri lanka janadhipathiwaraya maladiwayin janadhipathi abdulla yamin saha pakisthana agamathi nawash sharif mahathwarun samangada sakachcha kirimata niyamithayi.narendra modi mahathage diwurum dime ulela sandaha kalapiya ratawal rasaka rajya nayakayan athulu rajyathanthrikayan wishala pirisakata aaradhana kara thibena athara shri lanka janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage paminima suwisheshi awasthawak bawada eya kalapiya sahayongithawaya wenuwen behewinma hithakara thaththwayak wana bawada wides madhya penwa deyi.

me ugathaya, me nugathaya, me posathaya, me duppathaya, me kulawathaya, me kulahinayaya washayen wenasak nosithana ha nokarana tharamata ee mahatha samanathmathawadiyeku wu athara yamakuta atha dennata porondu wuwahoth eya kawarakarayen barapathala deyak wuwada atha denawa misa manga noharina tharamata methuma awankaya.thama shishya shishyawanata ho thama deshapalana anugamikayekuta ho kisima dinaka, kisima witaka, kisiyam deyak waradunu thanakadi sarawara kirimen thorawa danduwam kirimen thorawa waraduna thana kiya dennata tharam methuma nihathamani sundara miniseki.podu jana eksath peramunu rajaye ha warthamana eksath janatha nidahas sandhana rajaye paksha nayakayin siyalu denagema imahath gaurawadarayata pathra wu rejinold kure mahatha wadidena athare asu piru than athi deshapalanagnyayeku lesada prakataya.rata daya wenuwen thawath wasara gananawak sewaya karannata shakthiya ha dhairyaya rejinold kure mahatha hata labewayi awasana washayen prarthana karami..
